helmet.title: AI for Recruiting Agencies - DealoAgent.ai
helmet.description: Automate candidate screening, parsing, and outreach with DealoAgent.ai. See how recruiters save 70% of admin time.

header.title: AI for Recruiting Agencies
header.description: See how DealoAgent transforms the recruiting process for recruiters, sales teams, and agency owners.

recruiter.title: Focus on candidates, not admin

items.0: Manual CV Processing: Candidates send PDFs or Docs that I have to manually convert and compare against vacancy skills.
items.1: Fragmented Data Collection: I chase information across emails, messengers, and calls to fill vacancy forms. It's endless manual cycles, and I never know if a profile is truly complete.
items.2: Redundant Interviews: I waste time in voice interviews asking questions about information the candidate already provided but I missed.
items.3: Research Nightmare: Digging into candidate backgrounds manually is time-consuming and overwhelming.

items.0: Automated Parsing: All documents are converted on the fly from emails, messengers, or chats and instantly connected to the candidate.
items.1: Smart Gap Filling: AI generates specific questions to fill missing vacancy details (even for candidates who ignore points), ensuring 100% completeness.
items.2: Intelligent Interview Prep: AI analyzes all past info to suggest the EXACT questions I need. Voice call transcripts automatically fill any remaining unclear info.
items.3: Deep Insights: Integrated deep research automatically adds special focusing points to the candidate report.

recruiter.quote: "And good news, no need to wait for approval from the top or long integration decisions. I just started using it alone, and it works like a charm."

testimonial.name: Sarah Jenkins
testimonial.text: "It's like having a team of 5 assistants working 24/7. My placement rate has doubled in just 3 months."

sales.title: Predictable pipeline, personalized outreach

items.0: Manual Prospecting: I spent hours manually hunting for companies hiring for roles we cover. It was a slow, hit-or-miss process.
items.1: Generic Outreach: To hit my numbers, I had to send generic "spray and pray" emails. Personalization was impossible at scale, so response rates were low.
items.2: Lost Context: When a lead finally replied, I'd scramble to find past notes or emails. I often walked into calls blindly, forgetting key details from months ago.
items.3: Missed Follow-ups: I relied on memory or sticky notes to follow up. Valuable leads constantly slipped through the cracks.

items.0: AI-Driven Targeting: DealoAgent identifies high-intent leads using integrated databases with 750M+ verified emails and tracks companies matching your niche who just posted relevant jobs.
items.1: Hyper-Personalization: AI uses 'hidden facts' search to uncover lead mentions online, creating 100% personalized messages that reference specific roles, company news, and our top candidates.
items.2: Unified Intelligence: Every email, call, and LinkedIn message is analyzed. I get a "cheat sheet" before every interaction with full context and suggested talking points.
items.3: Smart Re-engagement: The system alerts me when a dormant lead shows buying signals (like visiting our site or posting a new role) and drafts the perfect re-opening line.

sales.quote: "And good news, no need to wait for approval from the top or long integration decisions. I just started using it alone, and it works like a charm."

testimonial.name: Michael Chen
testimonial.text: "I've moved from chasing leads to managing a steady stream of qualified meetings. My commission checks have never been higher."

ceo.title: Scale without headcount

items.0: Operational Black Box: I relied on weekly manual reports to understand what was happening. By the time I saw the data, it was often too late to fix issues.
items.1: Performance Blind Spots: It was hard to distinguish between busy work and actual progress. I couldn't easily tell who was performing and who needed help without digging through CRM logs.
items.2: Reactive Management: Correcting an employee's approach required sitting in on calls or reviewing random emails. I was always reacting to problems rather than preventing them.
items.3: Fragmented Oversight: Sales and recruiting data were disconnected, making it impossible to get a unified view of the agency's health.

items.0: Conversational Intelligence: I simply chat with the AI to get real-time status updates. "Show me the sales pipeline" or "Visualize team activity" generates instant diagrams and reports.
items.1: Performance Clarity: The AI identifies top performers and those struggling based on actual conversation outcomes, not just activity metrics.
items.2: Scalable Coaching: I can instantly correct course. The AI analyzes communication styles and highlights areas for individual improvement, allowing me to provide specific, timely feedback.
items.3: Proactive Leadership: I have a 24/7 pulse on every prospect and employee. I can spot trends and steer the ship with data-backed confidence.

ceo.quote: "And the best part? No special technical deployment was required. We simply connected our communication channels, and it started delivering value immediately."

testimonial.name: Elena Rodriguez
testimonial.text: "DealoAgent gave us the operational leverage we needed to grow. It's the best investment I've made for my business."

rep.title: 100x More Deals, Automated Outreach

items.0: Manual Prospecting: I wasted hours on LinkedIn manually hunting for leads. My pipeline velocity was dead slow.
items.1: Spray & Pray: To hit quota, I sent generic emails with low open rates. Personalization at scale was impossible.
items.2: CRM Data Entry Hell: Updating the CRM took longer than selling. I missed follow-ups and inadvertently caused churn.
items.3: Limited Bandwidth: I could only handle a few dozen prospects effectively. Scaling up meant burnout.

items.0: AI Outreach & Research: The AI finds MQLs/SQLs, researches them, and drafts hyper-personalized sequences. I just approve and close.

testimonial.text: "I'm booking 5x more demos with less effort. It's like having a dedicated research team."

items.0: Tied to the Desk: I had to be glued to my laptop to check dashboards. If I traveled, I lost visibility.
items.1: Delayed Updates: I was always chasing the team for status updates via Slack. "Did we close that Enterprise deal?"
items.2: Guesswork: Scaling meant chaos. I didn't know if our new messaging was landing or if we were burning cash on bad channels.
items.3: Reactive: I only found out about missed targets at the end of the month when it was too late to fix.

items.3: Slow Adaptation: Market shifts happened faster than we could react. Our strategy was always outdated.

helmet.title: AI for Venture Capital - DealoAgent.ai
helmet.description: Transform deal flow and due diligence with AI. Automate research, scoring, and market analysis for VC firms.

header.title: AI for Venture Capital
header.description: See how DealoAgent transforms deal flow and due diligence for analysts and partners.

analyst.title: Deep diligence in minutes, not days

items.0: Manual Data Entry: I spend hours copy-pasting data from pitch decks and emails into our CRM. It's tedious and prone to errors.
items.1: Fragmented Deal Flow: I struggle to build comprehensive reports on potential or existing portfolio startups. Information is scattered across emails, messengers, and pitch decks, making it impossible to get a unified view without hours of manual compilation.
items.2: Slow Due Diligence: Building a comprehensive competitive landscape takes me weeks of Googling and reading reports.
items.3: Superficial Research: With high deal volume, I can only do surface-level checks. I often miss critical details about founders, market dynamics, and hidden competitors because I lack the time for deep dives.
items.4: Complex Tools: Our CRM requires complex filters and clicks to find anything. I spend more time managing software than analyzing deals.

items.0: Automated Ingestion: I just forward pitch decks to the AI. It extracts team, market size, and traction data and fills the CRM automatically.
items.1: Automated Intelligence & Outreach: The AI aggregates data from all channels and automatically creates outreach emails or messages with specific questions to fill missing information, ensuring comprehensive reports with zero manual effort.
items.2: Instant Landscapes: I ask "Show me the competitive map for [Startup]" and get a detailed comparison table with strengths and weaknesses in seconds.
items.3: Deep AI Research: AI autonomously searches for 'hidden facts' and mentions about founders across 750M+ verified email records and public web data to build a 100% personalized investment thesis and background report.
items.4: Native Language Communication: I simply chat with the AI to get real-time insights. "Show me the competitive landscape" or "Draft a follow-up" - it understands context and executes instantly.

analyst.quote: "I can now cover 5x more startups without working weekends. The depth of insight I get instantly is like having a team of researchers."

testimonial.name: David Kim
testimonial.text: "The automated competitive mapping alone saves me 10 hours a week. It's a game changer for our deal flow."

partner.title: See the whole board, never miss a unicorn

items.0: Operational Black Box: I relied on weekly manual reports to understand what my analysts were working on. By the time I saw the data, hot deals were already cold.
items.1: Performance Blind Spots: It was hard to distinguish between busy work and actual deal sourcing. I couldn't easily tell which analysts were bringing in quality leads without digging through email threads.
items.2: Reactive Management: Correcting an analyst's investment thesis required sitting in on calls or reviewing random notes. I was always reacting to missed opportunities rather than preventing them.
items.3: Fragmented Oversight: Deal flow and due diligence data were disconnected, making it impossible to get a unified view of the firm's pipeline health.

items.0: Conversational Intelligence: I simply chat with the AI to get real-time status updates. "Show me the deal pipeline" or "Visualize analyst activity" generates instant diagrams and reports.
items.1: Performance Clarity: The AI identifies top performers and those struggling based on actual deal quality and outreach outcomes, not just activity metrics.
items.2: Scalable Coaching: I can instantly correct course. The AI analyzes investment memos and highlights areas for individual improvement, allowing me to provide specific, timely feedback on thesis alignment.
items.3: Proactive Leadership: I have a 24/7 pulse on every deal and analyst. I can spot trends and steer the firm with data-backed confidence.

partner.quote: "It's like having a Chief of Staff who never sleeps. We're closing better deals because we're moving faster and with more conviction."

testimonial.name: James Sterling
testimonial.text: "DealoAgent gives us an unfair advantage. We see the patterns others miss."

agent.title: Empowered, not monitored

items.0: QA Anxiety: I was constantly worried about skipping a mandatory disclosure or compliance statement.
items.1: Escalation Fatigue: Without a playbook, I'd freeze when customers got angry, leading to long hold times and escalations.
items.2: Delayed Coaching: I'd get feedback on my calls weeks later, when the context was already lost.
items.3: KPI Uncertainty: I didn't know my AHT or CSAT standing until the monthly view.

items.0: Real-time Guardrails: The system alerts me instantly if I miss a script requirement, so I can fix it live on the call.
items.1: Winning Playbooks: I get live suggestions to turn "neutral" interactions into "happy" ones, boosting my CSAT.
items.2: Daily Micro-Goals: I see my FCR and AHT targets in real-time, with clips of my best moments.
items.3: Automated Coaching: The AI identifies my specific strengths and gaps, offering bite-sized coaching tips every morning.

agent.quote: "I feel much more confident knowing the system has my back. My customer satisfaction scores went up 30% in the first month."

owner.title: Total visibility, zero blind spots

items.0: 1% QA Sample Liability: QA could only listen to 1% of calls. We had massive blind spot exposure on 99% of interactions.
items.1: Blind Spot Exposure: We only found out about compliance breaches or prohibited language usage when a client complained.
items.2: Biased QA Scoring: Performance reviews were subjective and inconsistent, based on random call samples.
items.3: Unclear Seat Utilization: It was hard to track true Occupancy and justify headcount efficiency to clients.

items.0: 100% QA Audit: AI scores and audits EVERY single call. We know exactly what is happening in real-time across the entire floor.
items.1: Compliance Firewall: We can search across all transcripts for "risky promises" or specific prohibited terms to mitigate liability.
items.2: Occupancy & Shrinkage Insights: Leaderboards based on "AHT" and "Adherence" let us reward true productivity.
items.3: Natural Language BPO Queries: I can ask "Show me the trend of happy customers this month" and get an instant chart to share with stakeholders.

owner.quote: "We moved from reactive damage control to proactive quality engineering. Operations are finally transparent."

quote.text: Is there an AI bubble? With the massive number of dollars going into AI infrastructure such as OpenAI‚Äôs $1.4 trillion plan and Nvidia briefly reaching a $5 trillion market cap, many have asked if speculation and hype have driven the values of AI investments above sustainable values. However, AI isn‚Äôt monolithic, and different areas look bubbly to different degrees.
quote.author: Andrew Ng

13.title: Competitive Landscape
13.content: Only platform unifying CRM + AI Outreach + Competitor Intel.
items: Apollo: Strong database, weak conversational AI
HubSpot: Enterprise standard, but slow and manual
Clay: Excellent enrichment, not a sales workflow
Folk: Modern contact manager, lacks deep sales AI
Attio: Flexible data, requires manual build-out
Amplemarket: Good outreach, siloed from CRM data
Close: High velocity calling, weak AI reasoning
DealoAgent: Unified AI Sales Agent & CRM
